long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have dozens of active tabs that consume too many computer resources?

Just discard an active tab or an entire tab group from memory by simply clicking extension's icon. Discarded tabs are still visible on the tab strip and are reloaded when activated. Pin it for the quick access!
